左.definition: left; the Left (politics); east; unorthodox; queer; wrong; differing; opposite; variant of 佐[zuo3]

左不過.definition: anyhow; in any event; just; only

左丘明.definition: Zuo Qiuming or Zuoqiu Ming (556-451), famous blind historian from Lu 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2] to whom the history Zuo Zhuan 左傳|左传[Zuo3 Zhuan4] is attributed

左傳.definition: Zuo Zhuan or Tsochuan, Mr Zuo's Annals or Mr Zuo's commentary on 春秋[Chun1 qiu1], early history c. 400 BC attributed to famous blind historian Zuo Qiuming 左丘明[Zuo3 Qiu1 ming2]

左傾機會主義.pinyin: zuo3 qing1 ji1 hui4 zhu3 yi4

左券.definition: a sure thing; a certainty; copy of a contract held by a creditor

左右.definition: left and right; nearby; approximately; attendant; to control; to influence

左右兩難.definition: (idiom) between a rock and a hard place; in a dilemma

左右勾拳.definition: left hook and right hook (boxing); the old one-two

左右手.definition: left and right hands; (fig.) capable assistant; right-hand man

左右為難.definition: (idiom) between a rock and a hard place; in a dilemma

左右袒.definition: to take sides with; to be partial to; to be biased; to favor one side

左右逢源.definition: lit. to strike water right and left (idiom); fig. to turn everything into gold; to have everything going one's way; to benefit from both sides

左右開弓.definition: lit. to shoot from both sides (idiom); fig. to display ambidexterity; to slap with one hand and then the other, in quick succession; to use both feet equally (football)

左嗓子.definition: off-key singing voice; sb who sings off-key

左字頭.definition: "top of 左 character" component in Chinese characters

左宗棠.definition: Zuo Zongtang (1812-1885), Chinese administrator and military leader

左宗棠雞.definition: General Tso's chicken, a deep-fried chicken dish

左思.definition: Zuo Si (3rd century), Jin dynasty writer and poet

左思右想.definition: to turn over in one's mind (idiom); to think through from different angles; to ponder

左拉.definition: Zola (name); Émile Zola (1840-1902), French naturalist novelist

左權.definition: Zuoquan county in Jinzhong 晉中|晋中[Jin4 zhong1], Shanxi

左權縣.definition: Zuoquan county in Jinzhong 晉中|晋中[Jin4 zhong1], Shanxi

左氏春秋.definition: Mr Zuo's Spring and Autumn Annals, attributed to famous blind historian Zuo Qiuming 左丘明[Zuo3 Qiu1 ming2]; usually called Zuo Zhuan 左傳|左传[Zuo3 Zhuan4]

左營.definition: Zuoying or Tsoying district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan

左營區.definition: Zuoying or Tsoying district of Kaohsiung city 高雄市[Gao1 xiong2 shi4], south Taiwan

左耳入，右耳出.pinyin: zuo3 er3 ru4 , you4 er3 chu1
左耳入，右耳出.definition: in one ear and out the other

左聯.definition: the League of the Left-Wing Writers, an organization of writers formed in China in 1930; abbr. for 中國左翼作家聯盟|中国左翼作家联盟[Zhong1 guo2 Zuo3 yi4 Zuo4 jia1 Lian2 meng2]

左袒.definition: to take sides with; to be partial to; to be biased; to favor one side

左道惑眾.definition: to delude the masses with heretical doctrines (idiom)

左邊.definition: left; the left side; to the left of

左邊兒.definition: erhua variant of 左邊|左边[zuo3 bian5]

左鄰右舍.definition: neighbors; next-door neighbors; related work units; colleagues doing related work

左鄰右里.definition: see 左鄰右舍|左邻右舍[zuo3 lin2 you4 she4]

左雲.definition: Zuoyun county in Datong 大同[Da4 tong2], Shanxi

左雲縣.definition: Zuoyun county in Datong 大同[Da4 tong2], Shanxi

左顧右盼.definition: glancing to left and right (idiom); to look all around
